    N = len(elements)
    inner_data = numpy.zeros((N*(N-1))/2)
    k = 0
    for i in range(len(elements)-1):
        e_i = elements[i]
        for j in range(i+1,len(elements)):
            e_j = elements[j]
            inner_data[k] = old_matrix[e_i, e_j]
            k+=1
    return CondensedMatrix(inner_data)
